um.

and then another thing was like when i was trying to lead a small group and going up to strangers and asking them if they'd want to be my friend and stuff.  I felt very disingenuine because I knew that even though I was trying to be their friend, my motives for being their friend wasn't completely honest.  I was just trying to get them to join my small group and come to Bible study and things like that.  And so from there, I wasn't feeling completely honest with myself.
